item.title: R to @mmasnick: Out of curiosity, how would you do that if you could? YouTube can decide to take down or demonetize any video for any reason. Platforms aren’t obligated to host anything they don’t want to, even if it could be determined to be fair use in court. How would you change that?
item.dc:creator: @waxpancake
item.description: Out of curiosity, how would you do that if you could? YouTube can decide to take down or demonetize any video for any reason. Platforms aren’t obligated to host anything they don’t want to, even if it could be determined to be fair use in court. How would you change that?

item.title: R to @fishtweets: I know I’m biased, but I don’t think there’s anything out there quite like it… There are events like Roguelike Celebration and !!Con that share similar values, but very different subject matter
item.dc:creator: @waxpancake
item.description: I know I’m biased, but I don’t think there’s anything out there quite like it… There are events like Roguelike Celebration and !!Con that share similar values, but very different subject matter

item.title: R to @GLASYSmusic: their soups are incredible, but the strong coffee leaves me vibrating until well after midnight. i think they put speed in the condensed milk https://mrgan.com/havl/
